title: Update failed
body: It says "Update failed. Unspecified error occurred. Please check the logs for more information." There is only one option, that is retry. When i clicked it, then message just pops back up so i cannot do anything. the same happens when I tried to close the dialog box. Please help :(. I would try to avoid reinstalling lol because my internet connection is metered and limited. thanks.

replies.body: I've got it already. I went to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends and then used the legacy client and it worked :). After that it just updates automatically and then wala I can play now. thanks though ;){{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
I'd like to help, but just need a little more info!  At what percent exactly are you getting that error?  That will help determine what might be causing the issue.  Let me know!
